judge.rationale: Matches include multiple emails from no-reply@accounts.google.com with subjects containing 'Security alert' (e.g., 'Security alert for...' and 'Critical security alert...'). Aggregation also shows 4 results from accounts.google.com.

Results include multiple emails titled 'OpenAI @ UC Berkeley' from GPTDAO (shared1.ccsend.com), matching the UC Berkeley event request. An additional hackathon email appears but does not contradict or mislead.
Matches include a recent Yelp email (‚ÄúWait, how was Beastea? üí≠‚Äù) from no-reply@mail.yelp.com, which implies Yelp was asking for feedback/a review. No contradictory info present.
Matches include Bandsintown notifications referencing LANY (Soft World Tour Part 1, pre-sale code SOFTWORLDTOUR, tickets available), which aligns with the user‚Äôs request and expectation.

Matches include multiple Upwork new job alert emails with subjects and brief snippets providing job titles and short descriptions; sufficient to produce a brief summary. No contradictory information present.

The only match is a generic weekly inbox summary unrelated to the 'OpenAI @ UC Berkeley' thread and does not include themes like event, OpenAI, Berkeley, or speakers. Aggregation is empty and provides no relevant context.

The monthly summary explicitly highlights job alert themes (AI/GenAI/ML roles, LLM/agent/RAG, Upwork/LinkedIn alerts) and includes an executive paragraph noting inbox dominance by hiring activity. Although it includes other topics, it still meets the request for a monthly rollup mentioning job alert themes.

All returned items are unread and have dates greater than the received_after checkpoint (1760918400, 2025-10-20T00:00:00Z), indicating only new items since last run. No older items appear, so re-scan overlap is minimized. Aggregation counts align with the matches (1 from streamlit.discoursemail.com, 4 from linkedin.com).
Matches include explicit has_attachments metadata, with at least two recent emails marked has_attachments: true (from brook@thrv.com and chan@theburntapp.com), satisfying the request.
